item.title: Bill Murray Is Opening a Caddyshack Bar Near Chicago
item.description: Bill Murray and his brothers are set to open a Caddy Shack golf-themed restaurant near Chicago, where the icon got his start in comedy.

item.title: Will Kevin Costner Return in Bull Durham 2?
item.description: Kevin Costner offers his take on sequels and answers whether or not he'd ever be willing to come back for Bull Durham 2.

item.title: Jyn's Mom Was Almost a Jedi in Rogue One
item.description: The Art of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story book reveals that there were originally supposed to be Jedi in the story.

item.title: This Rogue One Fan-Made Opening Crawl Is Perfect
item.description: One enterprising fan has created an opening crawl for Rogue One fans who missed having the signature Star Wars prologue.

item.title: War for the Planet of the Apes Brings Back This Classic Character
item.description: A younger version of a key character from the original 1968 Planet of the Apes will return in War.

item.title: Justin Bieber Is Wanted in Argentina for Assault and Theft
item.description: Justin Bieber will be arrested if he travels to Argentina for a years-old case involving his security guards and the beating of a photographer.

item.title: Full Justice League Cast Announced, Lex Luthor Will Return
item.description: Warner Bros. has announced the cast for the upcoming Justice League movie, confirming Jesse Eisenberg will return as Lex Luthor.

item.title: This Life-Sized Iron Man Suit Can Be Yours for $360K
item.description: A Chinese toy company has made a life-sized Iron Man robot suit, but it comes at a very steep price.

item.title: Tomb Raider Reboot Begins Shooting in January 2017
item.description: Alicia Vikander and Walton Goggins will go head-to-head in Tomb Raider as the franchise gets rebooted for the big screen in 2017.

item.title: New Rogue One Photo Officially Reveals Star Wars Rebels Cameo
item.description: Lucasfilm has officially released an image from Rogue One cameo that shows off the big Star Wars Rebels cameo.

item.title: Chewbacca Sings Silent Night in New Star Wars Holiday Video
item.description: Chewbacca busts out his Wookie rendetion of Silent Night in what could be the perfect companion to the Star Wars Holiday Special.

item.title: Wonder Woman Steals the God Killer Sword in New Photo
item.description: Gal Gadot gets her hands on an iconic weapon in the latest sneak peek at Warner Bros.' Wonder Woman.

item.title: Explore the New Star Wars Planets in Rogue One Locations Video
item.description: A new video featurette delves into the lore behind some of the new planets seen in this December's blockbuster Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.

item.title: Alien: Covenant Photo Runs Red with Chestburster Afterbirth
item.description: More Alien: Covenant photos emerge as fans await the release of the first scary trailer.

item.title: Jerry Lewis Destroys Reporter in the Best Interview of 2016
item.description: 90-year-old Jerry Lewis proves to be most uncooperative in a hilarious new interview that brings 2016 to a close in the best way possible.

item.title: 2016 Trailer Mashup Reminds Us at Least the Movies Were Good
item.description: Take a look back at the year that was in the cinema with an epic four-minute video that celebrates the most memorable movies of 2016.

item.title: Mr. Robot Star Wants to Play Poison Ivy in Gotham City Sirens
item.description: With Megan Fox rumored to star as Poison Ivy, Stephanie Corneliussen makes a play for the Gotham City Sirens villain.

item.title: J.K. Rowling Is Writing 2 New Books, Is One of Them Harry Potter?
item.description: J.K. Rowling confirms on social media that she is writing two new novels, but they won't be following a particular Newt Scamander from Fantastic Beasts.

item.title: Nerf Herders Were in the Original Rogue One Script
item.description: Gary Whitta, who wrote the early draft of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, reveals some of the stuff that got cut out of his first drafts.

item.title: Dune Reboot Targets Blade Runner 2049 Director
item.description: Arrival and Blade Runner 2049 Director Denis Villeneuve, is reportedly in talks to direct the Dune reboot.

item.title: New and Original Ghostbusters Unite in Epic Crossover Comic Book
item.description: Holtzmann, Yates, Tolan, and Gilbert will team up with Venkman, Stantz, Zeddemore, and Spengler in a new Ghostbusters comic book series.

item.title: Luke Skywalker's New Alien Friends Revealed in Star Wars 8?
item.description: Fans will be introduced to a number of Luke Skywalker's new alien friends on Ahch-To in Star Wars 8, according to a new rumor.

item.title: Emma Stone Says Male Co-Stars Steal Her Jokes
item.description: La La Land star Emma Stone claims that directors will give her improvised jokes to her male lead, and that she's been accused of hindering the process

item.title: Star Wars Celebration 2017 Badge Art Unveiled
item.description: Iconic Star Wars characters like Luke Skywalker, Rey, Jyn Erso and Ezra are featured in 12 pieces of badge art for Star Wars Celebration 2017.

item.title: John Wick Comic Book Series Is Coming in 2017
item.description: Dynamite Entertainment has announced a new comic book series based on the Keanu Reeves action franchise John Wick.

item.title: Marvel & Netflix Twitter Accounts Hacked by Security Group
item.description: The OurMine hacker group hacked into both Marvel Studios and Netflix's Twitter accounts over the past 24 hours.

item.title: Spider-Man Won't Return In Avengers: Infinity War?
item.description: A new casting call reveals the full cast for Avengers: Infinity War, and Tom Holland's Spider-Man is nowhere to be found on this list.

item.title: Star Wars Rebels May Retell Rogue One Story from New Perspective
item.description: Executive Producer Dave Filoni hints that events seen in Rogue One will play a key role in future Star Wars Rebels episodes.

item.title: Donnie Yen Vs. Vin Diesel in First xXx 3 Clip
item.description: Vin Diesel's Xander Cage chases Rogue One star Donnie Yen in an action packed new clip from xXx 3: The Return of Xander Cage.

item.title: Captain Marvel, Guardians & More Confirmed for Avengers: Infinity War
item.description: A new Disney casting call announces the main cast of characters in Avengers: Infinity War, which will introduce Brie Larson as Carol Danvers.

item.title: Blade Runner 2049 Will Be R-Rated, First Photos Arrive
item.description: Ryan Gosling and Harrison Ford grace the cover of this week's Entertainment Weekly, along with new photos, while the director confirms an R-rating.

item.title: Patriots Day Review: Wahlberg Is Boston Strong in Marathon Bombing Biopic
item.description: The immeasurably brave heroes who helped bring the Boston Marathon bombers to justice are put on display in the powerful Patriots Day.

item.title: Lee Byung-hun Talks Knives, Westerns and Magnificent Seven | EXCLUSIVE
item.description: Korean megastar Lee Byung-hun discusses working with an all-star American cast, and what he does in his spare time as Magnificent Seven heads to Blu-ray.

item.title: Wes Anderson's Isle of Dogs Video Introduces Stop-Motion Cast
item.description: Wes Anderson announces the cast of his newest project, a stop-motion canine adventure starring Edward Norton Called Isle of Dogs.

item.title: Expendables 4 Is Coming in 2018, Will Be Final Sequel
item.description: Splendid Film has picked up the German rights to The Expendables 4, which will be the final sequel in the franchise, arriving in 2018.

item.title: Liam Neeson Terrorizes Christmas in Santa Claus Audition Video
item.description: Liam Neeson delivers a terrifying rendition of Santa Claus in a hilarious sketch from The Late Show With Stephen Colbert.

item.title: Rogue One Director Explains Original Ending and How It Changed
item.description: Director Gareth Edwards talks about how the ending for Rogue One: A Star Wars Story was initially much different in early script drafts.

item.title: Suicide Squad Is IMDB's Most Popular Movie of 2016
item.description: The DC Films adventure Suicide Squad is at the top of IMDB's 10 Most Popular movies list for 2016.

item.title: Morgan Freeman Is the Voice of Zuckerberg's AI Assistant Jarvis
item.description: After searching for the perfect voice, Mark Zuckerberg has settled on Morgan Freeman as the voice his Iron Man inspired Jarvis AI.

item.title: A Cure for Wellness Trailer #2 Will Cause You Nightmares
item.description: Director Gore Verbinski returns to the horror genre with A Cure For Wellness starring Dane DeHaan and Mia Goth.

item.title: Justice League Photo Introduces the New Trinity
item.description: Warner Bros. prepares for a new year of DC Films with fresh photos from Justice League and Wonder Woman.

item.title: James Franco Confirms Alien: Covenant Role, More Photos Revealed
item.description: Get a closer look at Katherine Waterston's Daniels in a new Alien: Covenant photo, while James Franco confirms his role.

item.title: How Rogue One Fixes This Big Problem in Return of the Jedi
item.description: One of the major plot holes in Return of the Jedi has finally been fixed by the Star Wars spin-off movie Rogue One

item.title: Assassin's Creed Review: Save Your Money, Play the Game Instead
item.description: Michael Fassbender, Jeremy Irons and Marion Cotillard can't save Assassin's Creed, proving video game movies still suck.

item.title: Star Wars Opening Crawl Creator Thinks Rogue One Made a Big Mistake
item.description: Dan Perri, who created the original opening crawl for the first Star Wars movie, thinks it was a big mistake to omit the crawl in Rogue One.

item.title: Emoji Movie Trailer Unlocks the Secret World Inside Your Phone
item.description: Steven Wright introduces himself as Mel Meh in a sneak peek at the Emoji Movie, which proves to be too thrilling for words.

item.title: Forest Whitaker Returns as Saw Gerrera in Star Wars Rebels Season 3 Preview Video
item.description: Showrunner Dave Filoni and LucasFilm's Kiri Hart introduce Saw Gerrera's return in Star Wars Rebels Season 3, as voiced by Rogue One star Forest Whitaker.

item.title: Will Rogue One Dominate the Crowded Christmas Box Office?
item.description: Last week's winner Rogue One squares off against four new releases opening over the holiday weekend, including Sing and Passengers.

item.title: Secrets Behind Darth Vader's Castle in Rogue One Revealed
item.description: More information about Darth Vader's home on planet Mustafar has been revealed as Rogue One heads into its second weekend of release.

item.title: IMAX Uploads Mummy Trailer with Missing Audio and It's Hilarious
item.description: IMAX accidentally uploaded The Mummy trailer starring Tom Cruise that omits most of the soundtrack, and the results are nothing short of breathtaking.
